Package no.uis.imagegame

Class ImageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uis.imagegame.ImageController
  • @Controller
public class ImageController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class controlling the front end view of the image game and receives user input from there.

    • Method Detail

      • respondToGuesser

        @MessageMapping("/party/{partyId}/respToGuesser")
public void respondToGuesser​(@DestinationVariable
                             java.lang.String partyId,
                             @Payload
                             SocketMessage chatMessage)
        Sends a socket message to the guesser through the party ID when the proposer has chosen an image for starting the game. This tells the guesser what party they belong to.
        Parameters:
        partyId - Destination variable indicating the socket message is sent to the specific party route.
        chatMessage - Socket message containing the party ID.

      • addUser

        @MessageMapping("/party/{partyId}/addUser")
public void addUser​(@DestinationVariable
                    java.lang.String partyId,
                    @Payload
                    SocketMessage chatMessage,
                    org.springframework.messaging.simp.SimpMessageHeaderAccessor headerAccessor)
        Initialize the websocket handler and send a response to the client subscription
        Parameters:
        partyId - Destination variable indicating the socket message is sent to the specific party route.
        chatMessage - Socket message containing the party ID.
        headerAccessor - Automated object by SpringBoot to configure websocket sessions with

      • showImage

        @RequestMapping("/proposer")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView showImage​(org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView model,
                                                              @ModelAttribute("selectedlabel")
                                                              java.lang.Object modelname,
                                                              @RequestParam(value="partyId",required=false,defaultValue="-1")
                                                              java.lang.String partyId,
                                                              @RequestParam(value="username",required=false,defaultValue="-1")
                                                              java.lang.String userName)
        Proposer init, loads image and sends it to the view.
        Parameters:
        model - Model with attributes used to send data to the view and parse with Thymeleaf
        modelname - Image label name
        partyId - ID of the party the proposer belongs to
        userName - Name of the proposer used to display on the front. // TODO: Do we use it on the front?
        Returns:
        The configured model and view

      • receiveSocketUpdate

        @MessageMapping("/party/{partyId}/update")
public void receiveSocketUpdate​(@DestinationVariable
                                java.lang.String partyId,
                                SocketMessage message)
        Receive the client socket message every time a player performs and action on the game page. The messages are send to the respective party and game logic is performed there.
        Parameters:
        partyId - ID for the party the player belongs to
        message - Socket message containing data sent by user

      • showLabels

        @RequestMapping("/proposerImageSelection")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView showLabels​(@RequestParam(value="partyId",required=false,defaultValue="-1")
                                                               java.lang.String partyId,
                                                               @RequestParam(value="username",required=false,defaultValue="-1")
                                                               java.lang.String userName)
        Proposer image selection view init; Allows the user choose a picture which then sends a message to the respective guesser of the party.
        Parameters:
        partyId - Respective ID of the party the proposer belongs to
        userName - Username of the proposer
        Returns:
        Model and view with attributes used to send data to the view and parse with Thymeleaf

      • showImageGuesser

        @RequestMapping("/guesser")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView showImageGuesser​(@RequestParam(value="partyId",required=false,defaultValue="-1")
                                                                     java.lang.String partyId,
                                                                     @RequestParam(value="username",required=false,defaultValue="-1")
                                                                     java.lang.String userName)
        Guesser game view; The game actions are applied by the guesser here.
        Parameters:
        partyId - Respective ID of the party the proposer belongs to
        userName - Name of the guesser
        Returns:
        Model and view with attributes used to send data to the view and parse with Thymeleaf
